000568.SZ.summary: Luzhou Laojiao Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sales of liquor products in China. It offers National Cellar 1573, Century-old Luzhou Laojiao Jiaoling, Luzhou Laojiao Tequ, Touqu, Erqu, and other liquor series products. The company also provides agricultural product planting and sales, supply chain management business, technology and business development, import and export trade, and tourism services. In addition, it engages in the manufacture and sale of fruit and health care wines, and fermented products. The company was formerly known as Luzhou Laojiao Brewery. Luzhou Laojiao Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1950 and is headquartered in Luzhou, China.

000596.SZ.summary: Anhui Gujing Distillery Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, produces and sells liquor and spirits in China and internationally. It is also involved in commercial trade, motor transport, waste recycle, advertisement marketing, technical research, hotel management and operation, sewage treatment, electronic commerce, construction, food testing, and technology development activities. The company is headquartered in Bozhou, China. Anhui Gujing Distillery Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Anhui Gujing Group Co., Ltd.

000799.SZ.summary: Jiugui Liquor Co., Ltd. produces and sells liquor products in China. The company offers Chinese liquor, cultural wine, fragrant flavor liquor, and cave culture wine. Its liquor products consist of four series, including Dongcang, Neican, Jiugui, and Xiangquan. The company was founded in 1956 and is based in Jishou, China.

000858.SZ.summary: Wuliangye Yibin Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells liquor and wine products under the Wuliangye brand in China. It is also involved in printing, plastic product, glass bottle, and other businesses. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Yibin, China.

002304.SZ.long_name: Jiangsu Yanghe Brewery Joint-Stock Co., Ltd.
002304.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Yanghe Brewery Joint-Stock Co., Ltd. produces, packages, and sells liquors, wines, and spirits. It offers its products under the Yanghe and Shuanggou brands, as well as under the Yanghe, Shuanggou, Yanghe Spirit Classic, Zhenbaofang, Dream Blue, and Su trademarks. The company also engages in the commerce; waste material recycle; assets/investment management and information consultation; biological engineering research, enzyme preparation research, and technology transfer; network technology development, technical consultation, and software development activities. It is also involved in the freight transport, warehouse, and import and export business of self-run goods, agency goods, and technology; industrial investment, online business consultation, enterprise management consulting; sale of food and gifts; and house lease activities. In addition, the company provides movable and real estate investment services, and building construction services. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Suqian, the People's Republic of China.

002646.SZ.summary: Qinghai Huzhu Barley Wine Co.,Ltd. develops, produces, and sells highland barley wine in China. It offers its products under the Tianyou De, Mutual help, and Shiyide brands. The company is based in Weiyuan, China. Qinghai Huzhu Barley Wine Co.,Ltd. is a subsidiary of Qinghai Huashi Technology Investment Management Co., Ltd.

0389.HK.summary: China Tontine Wines Group Limited, an investment holding company, produces and sells grape wine products. The company offers sweet wines and dry wines under the Tongtian, Tongtian Hong, and TONTINE labels. It also produces and sells brandy, white wines, and ice wines, as well as processes grape juices. In addition, China Tontine Wines Group Limited is involved in the grapes plantation activity; and offers administrative services. It sells its products through distributors in 20 provinces, 3 autonomous regions, and 4 municipal cities in the People's Republic of China. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Tonghua, the People's Republic of China. China Tontine Wines Group Limited is a subsidiary of Up Mount International Limited.

0BR.F.summary: China New Borun Corporation produces and distributes corn-based edible alcohol in the People's Republic of China. The company operates in two segments, Corn-Base Edible Alcohol and its By-Products, and Chemical Products. The company offers edible alcohol products for use as an ingredient to producers of baijiu, a grain-based alcoholic beverage; and by-products of edible alcohol, such as distillers dried grains with soluble high-protein feed, liquid carbon dioxide, and crude corn oil. It also produces chemical products, including chlorinated polyethylene and 2-Acrylamido-2-methylpropane sulfonic acid for use in various industries. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Shouguang, the People's Republic of China. China New Borun Corporation operates a subsidiary of King River Holding Limited.

200596.SZ.summary: Anhui Gujing Distillery Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, produces and sells liquor and spirits in China and internationally. It is also involved in commercial trade, motor transport, waste recycle, advertisement marketing, technical research, hotel management and operation, sewage treatment, electronic commerce, construction, food testing, and technology development activities. The company is headquartered in Bozhou, China. Anhui Gujing Distillery Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Anhui Gujing Group Co., Ltd.

200869.SZ.long_name: Yantai Changyu Pioneer Wine Company Limited
200869.SZ.summary: Yantai Changyu Pioneer Wine Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, develops, produces, and sells wine, brandy, and sparkling wine in China, Chile, France, Australia, and Spain. It is also involved in grape growing and acquisition, as well as travel resource development, etc. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Yantai, China. Yantai Changyu Pioneer Wine Company Limited is a subsidiary of Changyu Group Company Limited.

300755.SZ.long_name: VATS Liquor Chain Store Management Joint Stock Co., Ltd.
300755.SZ.summary: VATS Liquor Chain Store Management Joint Stock Co., Ltd. operates a chain of liquor stores in China. It distributes domestic and international wines and alcohol products. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Beijing, China.

600059.SS.long_name: Zhejiang Guyuelongshan Shaoxing Wine Co., Ltd.
600059.SS.summary: Zhejiang Guyuelongshan Shaoxing Wine Co., Ltd. produces and distributes wine products in China and internationally. The company's products include Shaoxing yellow wine, fruit wine, and other wine products. It also produces and distributes glass bottles, biological products, and plastic products. In addition, the company is involved in the import and export trading business. Zhejiang Guyuelongshan Shaoxing Wine Co., Ltd. is based in Shaoxing, China.

600084.SS.summary: Citic Guoan Wine CO.,LTD produces and sells grape wine in China. The company is based in Urumqi, China.

600365.SS.summary: Tonghua Grape Wine Co., Ltd. produces, exports, and sells wine primarily under the Hongmei, Tonghua, and Tianchi brands in China and internationally. The company was founded in 1937 and is headquartered in Changchun, China.

600519.SS.summary: Kweichow Moutai Co., Ltd. produces and sells wine and liquor products in China and internationally. It offers aged, ordinary, low, and other Maotai liquor products. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Renhuai, China.

600543.SS.summary: Gansu Mogao Industrial Development Co.,Ltd. produces and sells wine in China. It offers dry red, white, Gabonon, sweet, sparkling, gift box, organic, ice wine, brandy, and other series products. The company's principal products include Mo Gao brand wine, licorice series products, and environmental protection products. Gansu Mogao Industrial Development Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is based in Lanzhou, China.

600559.SS.long_name: Hebei Hengshui Laobaigan Liquor Co., Ltd.
600559.SS.summary: Hebei Hengshui Laobaigan Liquor Co., Ltd. produces and sells wine in China. The company offers wine products under the Hengshui Laobaigan name. Hebei Hengshui Laobaigan Liquor Co., Ltd. is based in Hengshui, China.

600616.SS.summary: Shanghai Jinfeng Wine Company Limited produces and operates rice wine in China. It offers wine under the Shikumen, He, Golden Age, Wake up, Huiquan, White tower, Beautiful, and holy family brand names. The company was formerly known as Shanghai First Food Co., Ltd. Shanghai Jinfeng Wine Company Limited was founded in 1952 and is based in Shanghai, China.

600702.SS.summary: Shede Spirits Co., Ltd. produces and sells wines in China. The company is based in Suining, China.

600809.SS.long_name: Shanxi Xinghuacun Fen Wine Factory Co.,Ltd.
600809.SS.summary: Shanxi Xinghuacun Fen Wine Factory Co.,Ltd. produces and sells wine in China. It offers Fenjiu, Zhuyeqing, and other wine series products. The company also researches, develops, produces, and sells liquor; and invests in enterprises, as well as offers consulting services. It provides its wine and liquor products through direct sales force and wholesale agents. The company was formerly known as Shanxi Xinghuacun Fen Win Factory. The company was founded in 1949 and is based in Fenyang, China. Shanxi Xinghuacun Fen Wine Factory Co.,Ltd. is a subsidiary of Shanxi Xinghuacun Fenjiu Group Co., Ltd.

601579.SS.long_name: Kuaijishan Shaoxing Rice Wine Co., Ltd.
601579.SS.summary: Kuaijishan Shaoxing Rice Wine Co., Ltd. produces and sells rice wine in China. The company also exports its products to Japan, Singapore, Hong Kong, Macao, Europe, the United States, and other countries and regions. Kuaijishan Shaoxing Rice Wine Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Shaoxing, China.

603198.SS.summary: Anhui Yingjia Distillery Co., Ltd. operates in the brewing industry. The company offers wine. It markets its products to approximately 20 provinces, municipalities, and autonomous regions in China. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Lu'an, China. Anhui Yingjia Distillery Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Anhui Yingjia Group.

603589.SS.summary: Anhui Kouzi Distillery Co., Ltd. produces and sells liquor and glass products in China. The company offers its products under the Tongzi, Laokouzi, Kouzifang, and Kouzimei brand names. Anhui Kouzi Distillery Co., Ltd. was founded in 1949 and is based in Huaibei, China.

603779.SS.short_name: WEI LONG GRAPE WINE CO LTD
603779.SS.long_name: Wei Long Grape Wine Co., Ltd.
603779.SS.summary: Wei Long Grape Wine Co., Ltd. produces and sells wines in China. It offers organic, red, white, green, rosÃ©, sweet, and sparkling wines; grape special liquor; and brandy. The company is based in Longkou, China.

603919.SS.summary: JINHUI LIQUOR Co.,Ltd. produces and sells liquor primarily in China. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Longnan, China.

911616.TW.summary: Dukang Distillers Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the manufacture and sale of baijiu products in Mainland China. It sells its products through distributors to supermarkets, flagship and specialty stores, and restaurants under the Dukang brand. The company was formerly known as Trump Dragon Distillers Holdings Limited and changed its name to Dukang Distillers Holdings Limited in May 2010. Dukang Distillers Holdings Limited was incorporated in 2008 and is based in Zhengzhou City, the People's Republic of China.

BKV.SI.summary: Dukang Distillers Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the manufacture and sale of baijiu products in Mainland China. It sells its products through distributors to supermarkets, flagship and specialty stores, and restaurants under the Dukang brand. The company was formerly known as Trump Dragon Distillers Holdings Limited and changed its name to Dukang Distillers Holdings Limited in May 2010. Dukang Distillers Holdings Limited was incorporated in 2008 and is based in Zhengzhou City, the People's Republic of China.

BORNY.short_name: CHINA NEW BORUN CORP SPON ADS E
BORNY.summary: China New Borun Corporation produces and distributes corn-based edible alcohol in the People's Republic of China. The company operates in two segments, Corn-Base Edible Alcohol and its By-Products, and Chemical Products. The company offers edible alcohol products for use as an ingredient to producers of baijiu, a grain-based alcoholic beverage; and by-products of edible alcohol, such as distillers dried grains with soluble high-protein feed, liquid carbon dioxide, and crude corn oil. It also produces chemical products, including chlorinated polyethylene and 2-Acrylamido-2-methylpropane sulfonic acid for use in various industries. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Shouguang, the People's Republic of China. China New Borun Corporation operates a subsidiary of King River Holding Limited.

CTE.F.summary: China Tontine Wines Group Limited, an investment holding company, produces and sells grape wine products. The company offers sweet wines and dry wines under the Tongtian, Tongtian Hong, and TONTINE labels. It also produces and sells brandy, white wines, and ice wines, as well as processes grape juices. In addition, China Tontine Wines Group Limited is involved in the grapes plantation activity; and offers administrative services. It sells its products through distributors in 20 provinces, 3 autonomous regions, and 4 municipal cities in the People's Republic of China. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Tonghua, the People's Republic of China. China Tontine Wines Group Limited is a subsidiary of Up Mount International Limited.
